data.subject: Going Crazy (Chinese Ver.)
data.lyric:
jie bu kai hui yi chen
 zhong de jia suo
 mei yi mu zhuan zhe
 It’s killing me
 leng mo ci tong zhao

data.subject: 夢回暮夜 (Walk On Memories)
data.lyric:
ye mu xia na wei guang ti wo
 qing qing sa xiang ni
 fang fu yi wen qian qian xi ni
 de chun jiang n

data.subject: Chill (Chinese Ver.)
data.lyric:
Tonight bu si yi de gan jue chao
 gui yi de fen wei Oh no
 shun jian zai ruo yin de guang
 xian you

data.subject: 指語 (Touch It)
data.lyric:
shen me dou bu zu
 yi xing rong wo yan li de ni
 quan bu mei yi yi
 shuo bu chu wan fen zhi yi
 wo d

data.subject: C樂章 (Diamond)
data.lyric:
zai xue zhong si nue de Fire 
 wu zhi jing de ran shao 
 rang kong qi zheng teng de Higher 
 yan gai

data.subject: Forever (Chinese Ver.)
data.lyric:
You could be my only star 
 You could be the moonlight 
 wo jia shang ni 
 jiu deng yu yong yuan For

data.subject: 可愛·可惡 (What U do?)
data.lyric:
Yeah I want it
 Yeah I need it
 ni de mei li rang shui 
 xian ye tai tou wang
 shi zhong magic wu fa

data.subject: Ko Ko Bop (Chinese Ver.)
data.lyric:
Shimme shimme Ko Ko Bop
 I think I like it
 xin tiao sheng down down
 xiang shou zhe yun xuan
 bi sh

data.subject: 破風 (The Eve)
data.lyric:
zheng yan kan kan 
 What's the situation
 huang luan zhong 
 yan kan zui hou yi dao
 wei qiang zheng

data.subject: 내가 미쳐 (Going Crazy)
data.lyric:
차오는 안개처럼 밀려와
 조여오는 숨 It’s killing me
 덧나 버린 상처가
 깊어지잖아 자꾸 아려와
 But it was you
 그날의 악몽이 떠올라
 이번 만은 절대
